isis.stitle: ALTERNATOR: DELCO-REMY 26-SI SERIES - REPAIR PROCEDURES - DIODE TRIO REPLACEMENT

svcproc.title: DIODE TRIO REPLACEMENT
svcproc.para: Refer to Figure 8for terminal lead locations.

step1.para: Disconnect the "R" terminal lead from the "R" output terminal.
Disconnect the 3 rectifier bridge terminal leads from the rectifier bridge terminal.
Remove the capacitor lead connector from the rectifier bridge.
Remove the field regulator lead from the regulator.
Remove the screw from the capacitor ground and diode trio mounting tab and remove the diode trio.
Fasten the diode trio in place with the capacitor ground and diode trio mounting screw. Tighten finger tight.

Connect the "R" terminal lead to the "R" terminal output terminal. When installing the "R" terminal be sure the insulator is positioned properly to insulate the output terminal from the end frame. Tighten the terminal nut to 20 in. lbs. (2.3 N•m) torque.
Fasten the field regulator lead to the regulator. Tighten the insulated screw to 26 in. lbs. (3 N•m) torque.
Connect the 3 rectifier bridge terminal leads to the 3 rectifier bridge terminals. Tighten the nuts to 26 in. lbs. (3 N•m) torque.
Fasten the capacitor lead connector to the rectifier bridge. Tighten the screws to 26 in. lbs. (3 N•m) torque.
Tighten the capacitor ground and diode mounting screw to 26 in-lbs. (3 N•m) torque.
